Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh took 3 wickets for 14 runs
Mayank Yadav took 1 wicket for 7 runs
India won by 7 wickets with 49 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: India's young side outperformed an experienced Bangladesh team
Arshdeep Singh is approaching the top of wickets chart for India
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first time Mayank Yadav played any competitive cricket since his injury during the IPL
Varun Chakravarthy showed no ring rust on his T20I return
Others: India scored 71 runs in the powerplay, which is their fourth-highest they have conceded in powerplays
Sanju Samson and Suryakumar Yadav scored quick 29s
